Title: Authorizes the attorney general to approve certain state land acquisitions made for the purposes of land conservation
Summary: Authorizes the attorney general to approve certain state land acquisitions made for the purposes of land conservation, and to accept a title policy from a commercial insurer to cover any title defects that would otherwise render the title unmarketable.
LawCode: Amd ยง3-0305, En Con L; amd ยง3.17, Pks & Rec L; amd ยง63, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, the parks, recreation and historic preservation law and the executive law, in relation to authorizing the attorney general to approve certain state land acquisitions made for the purposes of land conservation
